deleted.description: true if the item is deleted.

type.description: The type of item. One of job, story, comment, poll, or pollopt.

by.description: The username of the item's author.

time.description: Creation date of the item, in Unix Time.

text.description: The comment, story or poll text. HTML.

dead.description: true if the item is dead.

parent.description: The comment's parent: either another comment or the relevant story.

kids.description: The ids of the item's comments, in ranked display order.

score.description: The story's score, or the votes for a pollopt.

title.description: The title of the story, poll or job. HTML.

parts.description: A list of related pollopts, in display order.

descendants.description: In the case of stories or polls, the total comment count.
